Watchlist

Watchlists are provided for you to save the stocks which you prefer. The lists help you to make faster trading / investment decisions. Access the Watchlist from the bottom tab.

Choice FinX provides you with 5 lists which can hold 50 scrips each. Select WATCHLIST from the bottom tab

Add to WatchList

  1. In an empty WATCHLIST use the “Search & Add” button which will directly take you to the Scrip Search. Simply select the required scrip and use

Watchlist Search

Every individual Watchlist is provided with a Searchbox to easily search through the scrips added. Simply type the initials of the scrip and it will come up. Next to the Searchbox is the FILTER with the options to choose the Exchange or Sort Alphabetically or by %

  1. Filter Attributes
    1. Exchange - Choose between various exchanges like NSE, NSEFO etc
    2. Sort - Alphabetically - Sort in Ascending or Descending order from A - Z
    3. Sort - Change % - Sort as per the Change in Stock % basis in ascending or descending order
NOTE: To Toggle between Watchlists press the Individual button or Swipe Left.

Arrange

  1. To Re-order, Rename the Watchlist, long-press any individual scrip, the WatchList will enter dynamic editable mode. Enter the Name you’d like to set
  2. To rename, enter the name you’d like in the text box
  3. Press and Hold Re-order Button and Drag scrip to where you want it to be on the list, Trash icon will remove the scrip
  4. Press Save
